title: Multipier effect on $2 billion drop in Ig

content.prompt: In an economy the marginal propensity to consume is 0.90, and gross domestic product (GDP) is $100 billion. If gross private domestic investment declines by $2 billion, then GDP will

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
